item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

For Monday 9/19/2011 We have a Brand New Location! :

LAZY LIZARD CAFE

Located on Crown Street just down from the intersection with Temple, Lazy Lizard Cafe just opened in August!  (This is the former location of "Synergy" for those whom knew it.)  The decor is some what eclectic and the food menu contains a variety of dishes.  The Lemon Chicken I tried was quite tasty!  Drinks range from a variety of specialty cocktails, to domestic beers and shots.  There is also a Game Room downstairs for those so inclined, most games are $1 in quarters!  (Pool, Darts, ect.  Quarters available at the Bar.)  There are also Large TV's by the Bar, perfect for Sporting Events! (Like Monday Night Football)

This is our first trip here, lets give them the Collective Welcome to New Haven and come out in Force!

BUT PLEASE BRING YOUR IDENTIFICATION! (Just Incase, they say they will have a doorman.)

The Owner Maria has generously offered us these Specials:

1/2 price Drinks from 6-8 (Typical full price is $6-$8, $10 for their specialty cocktails)

$3 Budwiser or Bud Light Pints All Night.

$3 Bartender's choice of shot (To Be Determined that night) All Night.

AND They will be putting out a complementary Food Buffet! (Pasta and or Snack type dishes are most likely.)

AND If we get a large enough group, Maria plans to either raffle off a Gift Certificate and or give out coupons for a later visit!

So Please RSVP early to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people!  The more numbers I have by Friday before, the better spread we may get.

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Special Thanks to Brooke for assisting in planning this Happy Hour.

I (A.J.) will serve as the contact for this evening. You can try my Cell at 315-345-9348, texting is fine as well.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text AJ at 315-345-9348. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar.
item.name: Happy Hour: Lazy Lizard! (Bring your ID For this *BRAND NEW LOCATION*)
